Hi,

I need some help with the source code for Heritrix 1.12

I've created =
a writer processor that stores the VIA links for
resources that are accepte=
d.

My problem is when there is a redirect or HTTP 301 status for a URI.
Th=
e getVia method of CrawlURI returns the link that was redirected.

For exam=
ple, assuming that this is the crawl log.

200 http://www.abc.com/pages.htm=
l --> http://www.abc.com/house.html
301 http://www.abc.com/house.html --> h=
ttp://www.abc.com/newhouse.html
200 http://www.abc.com/newhouse.html

If I =
call CrawlURL.getVia() for the "http://www.abc.com/newhouse.html"
URL it re=
turns "http://www.abc.com/house.html".

I think this is incorrect, because =
the 301 is a Moved Permanently
status message. So getVia is returning a URL=
 that will not be
available in the future. It should be returning
"http://w=
ww.abc.com/pages.html" which is the page that produced the
final URL.

Is t=
here a work around for this, because I can not figure out how to
find the o=
riginal VIA link for redirected links.
